name: HBASE
comment: This is comment for HBASE service

properties.name: hbase.regionserver.msginterval
properties.description:
Interval between messages from the RegionServer to HMaster
    in milliseconds.  Default is 15. Set this value low if you want unit
    tests to be responsive.

properties.name: hbase.client.pause
properties.description:
General client pause value.  Used mostly as value to wait
    before running a retry of a failed get, region lookup, etc.

properties.name: hbase.master.meta.thread.rescanfrequency
properties.description:
How long the HMaster sleeps (in milliseconds) between scans of
    the root and meta tables.

properties.name: hbase.server.thread.wakefrequency
properties.description:
Time to sleep in between searches for work (in milliseconds).
    Used as sleep interval by service threads such as META scanner and log roller.

properties.name: hbase.regionserver.handler.count
properties.description:
Count of RPC Server instances spun up on RegionServers
    Same property is used by the HMaster for count of master handlers.
    Default is 10.

properties.name: hbase.master.lease.period
properties.description:
Length of time the master will wait before timing out a region
    server lease. Since region servers report in every second (see above), this
    value has been reduced so that the master will notice a dead region server
    sooner. The default is 30 seconds.

properties.name: hbase.master.info.port
properties.description:
The port for the hbase master web UI
    Set to -1 if you do not want the info server to run.

properties.name: hbase.regionserver.info.port
properties.description:
The port for the hbase regionserver web UI
    Set to -1 if you do not want the info server to run.

properties.name: hbase.regionserver.info.port.auto
properties.description:
Info server auto port bind. Enables automatic port
    search if hbase.regionserver.info.port is already in use.
    Enabled for testing to run multiple tests on one machine.

properties.name: hbase.master.lease.thread.wakefrequency
properties.description:
The interval between checks for expired region server leases.
    This value has been reduced due to the other reduced values above so that
    the master will notice a dead region server sooner. The default is 15 seconds.

properties.name: hbase.regionserver.optionalcacheflushinterval
properties.description:
Amount of time to wait since the last time a region was flushed before
    invoking an optional cache flush. Default 60,000.

properties.name: hbase.regionserver.safemode
properties.description:
Turn on/off safe mode in region server. Always on for production, always off
    for tests.

properties.name: hbase.hregion.max.filesize
properties.description:
Maximum desired file size for an HRegion.  If filesize exceeds
    value + (value / 2), the HRegion is split in two.  Default: 256M.

    Keep the maximum filesize small so we split more often in tests.

properties.name: hbase.zookeeper.property.clientPort
properties.description:
Property from ZooKeeper's config zoo.cfg.
    The port at which the clients will connect.
